website_summaries.verdict: A great option if you're looking for a simple, compact machine that can produce crushed ice of all textures.
pros: Sturdy machine made with stainless steel blades
Non-slip rubber feet keep the ice crusher in place
Holds 2 cups of crushed ice cubes
cons: It may be a little difficult to hold steady because it doesn't have any grips or a suction cup base

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: If you use once a day it will break in less than 3 months. The plastic on the inside breaks. This has happened on two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes munching on crushed ice, but our ice maker quit working again. I've been looking for a decent manual ice crusher for months. Saw this one, and decided to give it a try. So far, both of us have been pleased. Took it out of the box, rinsed it off, attached the handle, and started crushing ice cubes. I've been crushing 8 trays a day for a week now. Can't vouch for how well it will hold up long term, but for the time I've had it, it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. West

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly effortless
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. We got it to use for a week at an outdoor event in which about a dozen people were camping with no electricity — we used it to crush store-bought bagged ice for mint juleps and other cocktails. It is surprisingly effortless to crank (I’m a 110-lb woman who was making all the drinks) and crushes a hopperful quickly. I now use it at home because I like the crushed textue it makes better than the texture of the crushed ice from the automatic crusher on my fridge. Seems to be great quality, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CEG

customer_reviews.title: Another customer was kind enough to tell me that it was like rolling up a window in an old car
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for an electric ice crusher. This one caught my eye because it had five stars. I was a little concerned because I was purchasing it for a lady in her nineties, so I asked about the difficulty of operating it. Another customer was kind enough to tell me that it was like rolling up a window in an old car. The recipient reports that she has had no difficulty at all using it, and that she loves the consistency of the crushed ice. (She likes it a little chunky; but I'm confident that one could get a smoother consistency by crushing it again.) She's using it every day and really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: worthamoor

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't but again
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 6 weeks a plastic piece broke off making the ice chips bigger. Unfortunately there is only a 30 day warranty. Since ice is a very hard substance they should make the inside all metal of some kind. It wouldn't be less likely to break. Very disappointed in product. I am on a fixed income and don't like to buy things that are likely no to hold up under use. Received a replacement after 8 weeks and after 3 weeks it broke a piece off again. I would not buy it again. Going try another.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Solid crusher that crushes, not shaves, ice.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for making Tiki drinks. The crushed ice is comparable to the famous Sonic crushed ice - slightly finer and it packs in a drink perfectly. Operation is smooth and very easy. It works on standard size ice cubes (the type produced by ice cube trays) with a bit of effort and it works effortlessly on cubes produced by the ice maker. The unit is stable, very easy to use and easily produces enough crushed ice for a party. The only slight downside is that the handle, scoop and lid come shipped in the ice bin and it took a bit of jiggling to get the bin out of the crusher the first time..
customer_reviews.author: ELBGuy

customer_reviews.title: Generally good product but part broke off today
customer_reviews.text: In general, this ice crusher was a life saver when the ice crusher on our refrigerator broke. It provides my wife the crushed ice that she love, it hasn't rusted or had any of the other problems that people reported. But today, one of the fins in the internal chamber broke off (see photo). It still functions, but the ice is coming out in much larger chunks due to the missing fin. Is there any way to replace the internal white plastic part of the chamber? Maybe it isn't perfect, but it has performed very well until today. Update 9/20/2020: And as of today, the handle broke. So down to three stars. Executes well, but doesn't really last long.
customer_reviews.author: Smelly Crudface

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handle knob fell off after a month. Why is there no link to send this ice crusher back?
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Sebastopol

customer_reviews.title: No rust. Melting ice works better
customer_reviews.text: So initially I did not like it, it was too hard to turn the handle, and I saw rust just after 2 uses. However tried rinsing the ice with hot water before crushing and it made turning the handle much easier. Also before I turned the unit upside down to dry, but instead I allowed it to dry upright with lid off. NO RUST. And I use 3-4 times a day
customer_reviews.author: ravicette doumas

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished!
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly, I purchased this ice crusher to chip ice for my dog who has some kidney issues. He loves chipped ice and this is a way to help him stay hydrated! I can prepare his ice vs. purchasing it at the grocery store. It works well all around!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gauvin

customer_reviews.title: I love this ice crusher
customer_reviews.text: I had tried ice crushers and snow cone machines in the past but always disappointed. This little ice crusher is simple. Doesn't leave ice all over counter. Small enough to leave on counter. Crushes ice to just the right size for cocktails. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: barbreads

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; crushes ice into shards perfect for drinks of any kind.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best manual ice crusher I've ever had. The crushed ice is shards that are the perfect ice shape and consistency for drinks of any kind. A great product; quality made; easy to operate and clean; and a must for any household/bar.
customer_reviews.author: F5

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fact that it was rust free and it ...
customer_reviews.text: After searching amazon I came across this ice crusher. I liked the fact that it was rust free and it crushed regular sized ice cubes. Unfortunately after only 3 mo. The plastic piece that helps crush the ice broke off and i noticed rust and silver like substance was also on the blades. I contacted the company who agreed to send a replacement. After 2 emails from them about sending a replacement for the crusher I have received nothing and now they are not responding to any subsequent emails being sent. The company is out of the UK their is no phone number to call only email correspondence.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael McCann

customer_reviews.title: MACHINE WORKS GREAT AT A GREAT PRICR!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice crusher! I am on dialysis, do it's better to eat ice than drink water etc due to fluid restrictions. Have had a bit of trouble with ice jamming. Read the instructions and had a quick remedy. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie D. Zoller

customer_reviews.title: Internal plastic divider/sizer broke.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Contacted Nuvantee. They replaced this item free. No hassle Thank-you Nuvantee. Loved this ice crusher. ... until last night, One of the plastic fingers that divide'/size the ice chips broke. Now the ice chips are too large. How do I contact company to try and redeem the Lifetime warrantee ?
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Summers

customer_reviews.title: Ice crusher
customer_reviews.text: This product was broken when it came. The legs on the bottom were stripped and laying in the box. They can not be put back on. The knob on side bent and could not get the bowl out it was stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce N.

customer_reviews.title: The chips are a tad smaller than I like, but they work really well in chilling cocktails
customer_reviews.text: The machine feels solid and looks well made. The crank is a little on the weak side I believe. I follow the directions and do not force it when it catches on an ice cube. The chips are a tad smaller than I like, but they work really well in chilling cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Dow III

customer_reviews.title: Don't plan on crushing ice with this Innovee Ice Crusher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ice crusher upon my husband's return from the hospital after a heart transplant. He liked the crushed ice in the hospital so after looking at what was offered I selected the Innovee. It was a total failure and I even tried freezing thinner ice cubes. His ice has to be made from bottled water so no store bought ice. So disappointed !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than ice in-door fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I toyed around with buying a new fridge so I’d have the convenience of crushed ice access in the door. Then, I ran across the Innovee manual ice crusher! I received it last week and have used it 3 times. It works great and looks nice enough to sit on my counter next to the fridge. HOWEVER, 3rd time to use, I noticed a crack in the container that catches the ice as it is crushed. How do I get a replacement for that?
customer_reviews.author: Janis McHaney

customer_reviews.title: Good blades and case, cheap shaft
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ice crusher for about 6 months and used it for cocktail ice about every other week typically. It crushed ice more consistently than most in-fridge units I've used, but recently the internal shaft started rusting. It looks like the force required to get through hard ice causes the blades to remove plating on the shaft and let water in. The rest of the unit is fine, but the shaft really needs to be stainless steel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well in demanding circumstances
customer_reviews.text: I crave crushed ice and go through a couple tray's worth most days. I have had this crusher for a few months now and it is holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Some dude

customer_reviews.title: Does the job I needed
customer_reviews.text: Low tech, low maintenance and made the perfect sized chips for a bed of ice for my clams on the half shell appetizer.
customer_reviews.author: maureen sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far, works as advertized! Although I would have liked a coarser crush, I am happy with the product. One thing I learned rather quickly; is to use a non skid mat under the crusher when using it and hold it down firmly on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: I found this item to be well constructed. However ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this item to be well constructed. However, the description said there were multiple sizes of shaved ice. There are no instructions whatsoever to tell me how to get different Sizes of ice. Also, without some sort of clamp or section to hold the item on the counter, I find it takes a lot of my muscle to keep it in place and turn the crank.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Pearcy

customer_reviews.title: Broke with occasional use after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Six months later and it is broken. Used with medium size cubes from an ice maker. Used occasionally and the inside plastic components broke off allow cubes to go through without crushing. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Self Destructs, CHOKING HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 months of occasional use the plastic partitions broke off. These pieces are small and could be a serious hazard to children if in their cups/glasses. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: MedievalMark

customer_reviews.title: Love my ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Love my ice maker. Easy to use and easy to clean up. You can make as little or as much as you want of the crushed ice.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best Manual Crusher Available
customer_reviews.text: What I would rather have is the same device but with a motor. The problem is the one's with a motor make snow-cone ice which I don't like. So until I find the perfect ice crusher this is the best manual crusher I've seen. It takes effort to crank it but it feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to frequent use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 9 months of use. While blades are stainless, there is a dark substance that leaks out of the blades and gets into ice. Some of the blades started to rust. Finally, one of the blades snapped off. Currently looking for another option for our family, since crushed ice is a daily thing.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Long

customer_reviews.title: Be careful  with plastic tabs between blades
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months light use plastic tabs separating blades broke. Interior plastic tabs are weak point of of item. Exterior metal and steel blades are a waste if they are combined with weak brittle plastic. Update: Nuvantee CS sent me a replacement after my original review. Their prompt action shows they stay behind their product so I modified the review.
customer_reviews.author: stockshowgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The ice crusher arrived missing the handle making it unusable, had to return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nasar

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Nov 2019. It broke in June 2020. One of the plastic gates that the steel teeth push the ice cubes through to crush them broke which causes the crushed ice to be twice as big as designed so not really crushed anymore. I contacted company about this but have heard nothing...I asked if this short 6 month life of the product is typical or these units usually last much longer?
customer_reviews.author: David McKeon

customer_reviews.title: True Crushed Ice, not shaved
customer_reviews.text: With the ice table top ice maker this little think works fantastic! If you ever been to Sonic and had a soda with their ice this is about how the Innovee Ice Crusher makes ice!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: could be much better however if had grips to make it easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: Crushes ice well, could be much better however if had grips to make it easier to hold in place. I bought some and stuck on the feet and that helped
customer_reviews.author: marcia perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: The best ice crusher I'VE EVER OWNED! It's perfect. It can crush a tray and a half of ice cubes in less than 3 minutes. I will be buying another one for use at work very soon.
customer_reviews.author: SouthSideDiva

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but feels somewhat flimsy and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and the ice is the perfect type of crushed ice for cocktails that call for crushed ice. My only criticism is that the handle feels light and flimsy. I fear it will break sooner than later, as some other reviewer have noted. I wish they would redesign it with a heavier duty handle.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is MUCH better than the first ice crusher that I bought (and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is MUCH better than the first ice crusher that I bought (and returned!) My only suggestion: I wish it had a handle on the side. I have to lean in and hold it to my chest to balance it while I turn the crank.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Rusts immediately
customer_reviews.text: This started rusting a week after I first got and used it. I cleaned it and it continues to rust every single time. You would think something designed for ice would not do that. Do not buy, even if you think you’ll keep up with just cleaning it over and over again. The rust seems to be internal and endless. By the way I only received this on August 27 (today is October 13 and I haven’t even used it in a while) so it’s not like it’s old.
customer_reviews.author: Shietsch

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought  this one
customer_reviews.text: I use the Ice Crusher for Ice Tea and Coffee. I was quite pleased with the Ice Crusher far more than I expected for such a small price. My only thought against it is not enough suction to hold while grinding but otherwise it is very good. An added benefit it looks nice on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hallbert

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, functional, great price
customer_reviews.text: not much more i can say. works and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the ice maker meets my expectations. I can grind ice whenever I need it in the amount that I need. I love to chew on ice and it's just the right size. This ice maker is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Somers

customer_reviews.title: Got what was wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my sister on her return from hospital. She said it makes great ice chips like the ones she got in hospital. She was very pleased. Need two hands to maneuver!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Extra piece
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with an extra round piece of plastic (see picture). I cannot for the life of me figure out where it belongs on the item. Otherwise, very easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: ice size
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn't gotten rid of the box I would have returned it. It was so hard to turn I couldn't do it. Then when my husband did it turned out like snow cone ice. I wanted broken ice for my glass of coke.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonna Stockel-Brewer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: thought this was going to be a great product but it is built cheaply and not easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Incredible and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This ice crusher is great. I am very impressed with the quality/ease of the product. My only complaint is that the lid arrived cracked. I would greatly appreciate if someone reached out to tell me how to get a replacement lid as I don't want to send the whole thing back.
customer_reviews.author: JustErika

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and the crushed ice is the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of crushed ice and this is exactly what I needed. Easy to use and the crushed ice is the right size.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: GLAD TO FIND THIS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE LOOKED FOR AN ICE CRUSHER FOR SOME TIME. WHEN I SAW THIS ONE, I KNEW THIS WAS THE ONE. IT CRUSHES ICE JUST THE WAY I WANTED. THE CONSTRUCTION IS GOOD AND SOLID.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Bridwell

customer_reviews.title: Good ice crusher - small counter footprint
customer_reviews.text: Really like this ice crusher. Pulverizes ice cubes in short time. Easy to use crank.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Patient in working the maker.
customer_reviews.text: Some ice made by refrigerator manufactures have curved/straight shapes and jam the blade action requiring reversing the crank action to dislodge the ice, modern ice makers in refrigerators do not make in the shape of a cube. However the crushed ice made is very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R West Jr

customer_reviews.title: Does what others can't
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, crushes ice just the way I like. I've used different crushers that had issues with scalloped ice cubes. Innovee crusher gets hung up from time to time and just crank a little harder and it tears the ice up. The other models I used you would have to constantly stir the cubes in the hopper for them to work. I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Frank Chance

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it twice but I love the size of the ice chips it makes
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it twice but I love the size of the ice chips it makes. Easy to use. It appears to be well made and I am really hoping it lasts a long while as I really really like it. It was more expensive than most manual units but worth it if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: michael fulton

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy
customer_reviews.text: This was not as good as I hoped it was cheap plastic it cracked in no time
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chicoine

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick ice grinding. It cuts the ice kind of small though
customer_reviews.author: Arlee Grimms

customer_reviews.title: Little over priced
customer_reviews.text: It is attractive, but really hard to keep turning for a older woman. Worried about breaking the handle as part plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S. Diegel

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your home bar
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Chips the ice rather small, almost slivers, but, that's what I wanted. Works perfectly with mixed drinks.
customer_reviews.author: banjoboy

customer_reviews.title: Manual Is The Best Way To Go
customer_reviews.text: Manual is the best way to go!!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love my crushed ice maker. I wish the ice was a little bigger when crushed though. But all in all it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: PBnJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This ice crusher works great. It doesn't take much force to crank the handle. It will move around on the countertop a little while you're cranking the handle, but it's really not excessive. The size of the crushed ice is just perfect for me. Works great for soft drinks and Cocktails. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: It works great! The pieces are a perfect size for her ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves ice and our ice chipper on our freezer recently stopped working so I purchased this product. It works great! The pieces are a perfect size for her and my ten year old loves to make ice for her.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Healan

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: takes a lot of strength to operate. If you are very old you may not have the strength to operate
customer_reviews.author: Lola Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and missing parts. Returned for refund but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: Power would be nice but not necessary. The crushed ice is fine and really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Gould

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever!
customer_reviews.text: New addition to my wet-bar very durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Elle Long

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The ice is crushed finer than the refrigerator crushed ice, but not so fine like snow cone ice. Easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good, but small shavings.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my ice crusher. If the ice gets caught, you just turn the handle back some then go forward again. The only thing is I wish that ice was just 1/4" larger was they come out. I enjoy chewing on my ice as I drink my beverage and these are more like shavings and melt a little to quickley.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool in my kitchen and bar arsenal. Works well and seems to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: crushes ice into small uniform size pieces which is great.
customer_reviews.text: The bearings on the first unit started being wobbly at 6 months of use. Had to replace unit after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well and I like the end product
customer_reviews.text: It works well and I like the end product. It feels lightweight and I'm not sure how long it will last but good for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Wilson-Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Plastic chips easily
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star because I LOVED the crushed ice it produced. Did not like the fact I turned the crank backwards as much as I did forward. Also, machine slides all over the counter when cranking the handle. Not easy to handle if you have problems with hands or arms. While eating the ice from machine I kept feeling something scratch my throat. Told my husband I must be getting a cold. Turns out it was a piece of plastic from the machine. By God's grace I did not swallow the plastic which might have done damage to vital organs since it had very sharp edges. Would not suggest anyone buy this product due to safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: You need to turn the handle both clockwise and counter clockwise.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine as long as you don’t over fill
customer_reviews.author: William Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Ice Crusher
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love it!! Works great, easy to you. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jolayne Rotolo

customer_reviews.title: Product is damaged
customer_reviews.text: The top doesn't fit. The ice recepticle is chipped and cracked. The screws on the feet are exposed (the rubber doesn't cover them) which completely damaged our counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Dunnington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is everything it's advertised to be. Definitely will recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: LASTED TWO MONTHS. I NEVER FORCED IT ONE TIME ...
customer_reviews.text: LASTED TWO MONTHS. I NEVER FORCED IT ONE TIME AND PART OF THE INSIDES (WHITE PLASTIC) BROKE OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and parts missing
customer_reviews.text: There is no top and the ice bucket is broken
customer_reviews.author: eddiek

customer_reviews.title: product review
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. So far reliable for the amount of ice I typically crush. Competitive pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bought on july 3rd broke on 5th December. Hope I get refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Powell

customer_reviews.title: It is very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep it, but I understood that the crush size was adjustable! Size is too small for martinis & too large for shave ice, but perfect for mint juleps. Too bad there aren’t more Kentucky Derbies!
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Crushed it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use & crushed the ice perfectly for mint julips!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Chops Ice Up Really Fine
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works great. It chops the ice up really fine. I'm not talking snow cone fine, but much small than any refrigerator ice crusher. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Wehrley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love to chew on crushed ice. I bought one of the electric ice crushers and it failed on the very first attempt. Returned it. Bought this and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ice crusher arrived earlier than expected and works like a dream! Good design and works well every time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M Kuni

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: It is so simple to use and it makes pretty consistently sized pieces. I was impressed at how good it works especially considering the price. It’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Balazs Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Deliver
customer_reviews.text: Deliver in a timely fasten. So far it been a good ice crusher with no problems
customer_reviews.author: John Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nit for the elderly!
customer_reviews.text: I am 78 years old and find it hard to turn. Probably should have ordered an electric crusher! It bounces around on me!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm so far
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm so far! If you find yourself needing a lot of crushed ice for serving drinks, this will do the job! Make sure you order a mini-ice cube ice tray to go along with it in order to be effective!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly what I was looking for! Had it for about 2 months now and no rusting issues. Really beats using a hammer and crushing the ice by hand!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Holds atray of ice and crusing it INSTEAD of shaving it. The pieces are perfectly sized.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product and the box came re-taped as ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and the box came re-taped as if someone had opened it and it was put back to sell. It is cheaply made, very tinny and totally not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Hated this product. Noisy, fragile, plastic, makes a half cup of crushed ice with a lot of effort. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like crunching ice?
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The ice pieces are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hays

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: It saves on electricity because it uses a hand crank. It makes a squeaky noise after turning the crank for awhile. Other than that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia solis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to crank when it's a full cube and you also have to hold it in place while cranking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just love my hand crank ice crushers
customer_reviews.text: I just love my hand crank ice crusher! Love it so much I had to order another one for our 2 favorite places! The secret to crushing is making sure the ice stays full in the top while your crushing it!

product_meta.title: Nuvantee Manual Ice Crusher - Rust-Proof Zinc Alloy Construction - Carbon Steel 430 Blade - Hand Crank Ice Grinder - Fine or Coarse Pieces - Non-Slip Base - Chrome Plated
feature_bullets: MANUAL ICE CRUSHER – This ice crusher machine couldn’t be easier to use. Add ice and then turn the simple ice crusher hand crank until you get the size/type of ice you desire. You can make tasty mint juleps, Moscow mules, margaritas, daiquiris, punch drinks, shaved ice drinks and much, much more.

NON-SLIP LEGS – To make things even easier for you, this ice crusher blender comes with strong, non-slip legs that help keep it securely in position. You don’t have to worry about the machine moving or falling over as you turn the hand crank ice crusher.

STAINLESS STEEL BLADES – The crusher ice machine’s stainless steel blades make it easy to get ice at the fineness level you desire. There’s no struggling to turn the crank – you don’t need to be a weightlifter to use this portable ice crusher!

STURDY & RUST-PROOF – Chrome-plated and featuring zinc alloy construction, this manual ice crusher is built to last. You also don’t have to worry about rust ruining your ice! You get great, clear ice every time with this ice crusher blender.

IDEAL FOR BARS & KITCHENS – Chopping, cutting and grinding ice to a desired fineness level has never been easier than with this ice crusher machine. Plus, it comes with a large capacity ice bucket and an ice spoon. Get yours today. Your manual ice crusher purchase will be backed by a hassle-free lifetime guarantee.
